statements: DELETE FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE patient_id = 100 AND reaction_type = 'Severe';
DELETE FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND reported_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM drug_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND patient_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM drug_analysis WHERE analysis_date <= '2022-06-30' AND analysis_result = 'Positive'
DELETE FROM AdverseDrugReactions WHERE report_id = 1234 AND patient_id = 5678
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'M'
DELETE FROM Drugs WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%Johnson%'
DELETE FROM Patient WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%' AND prescription ='Chemotherapy';
